title: John Bercow is a 'playground bully', claims candidate to replace him as Speaker
text:
John Bercow has been branded a "playground bully" who has "tarnished the role of Speaker" by one of the candidates vying to succeed him.

Shailesh Vara, the Conservative MP for North West Cambridgeshire and former Vice Chairman of the party, tore into the outgoing Speaker during a hustings event held in Parliament yesterday.

Mr Vara was joined in his criticism by Tory veteran Sir Edward Leigh, who claimed Mr Bercow is "perceived by a large part of the nation not to be impartial".
